The light bulb .
Edison is said to have created the first comercially practical incandescent light .
He was neither the first nor the only person trying to invent an incandescent light bulb .
Some historians claim there were 20 over inventors of incandescent lamps prior to Edison 's version , but Edison is often credited with the invention because his version was able to outstrip the earlier versions because of a combination of three factors : " an effective incandescent material , a higher vacuum than others were able to achieve and a high resistance that made power distribution from a centralized source economically viable . "
( taken from www.bulbs.com )

It 's not so hard to find sights to see in such a big city like Moscow , but when you have a wide variety of museums , parks , clubs , you will try to visit only the best ones .
Let 's look at the most popular places where tourists prefer spending their free time in Moscow .
I 'm sure i 'll agree that the Red Square is the most popular sight in the captial of Russia .
That 's why I suggest starting the journey from this place .
You can get there by metro ( Teatralnaya Station ) .
From the Red Square , you can easily see the Moscow Kremlin , St. Basils Cathedral , the State Historical Museum and Gum Trading House .
If you are dying of hunger , you can have a quick snack at Teremok cafe or have a square meal at the restaurant # 57 , which is on the the third floor of the Gum .
I prefer spending my free time in the parks .
Gorky Park is my favorite place for my leisure time .
There are lots of facilities , such as sports centre , a ping pong club , a hire centre etc .
So , if you want to have a memorable holiday , the capital of Russia is the most attractive place .

Generally speaking , it has been suggested that mixed - sex education will improve to the degree of learning system at schools .
However , I strongly believe that the measurement of education level does not explicitly interest with sex differences in the classes , but also it is related to the quality of education level in the schools .
Education has a crucial part in one society and it 's future and by improving the level of the educations system , students can learn more effectively in their entire education life and their career , but also their skills will be improved by this process .
Nowadays , unfortunately , students can not take enough education from their schools whereas in some poor countries .
On the other hand , by building a more effective learning system which will be provided by local authority , students will be encouraged them learn more efficient .
Lack of teaching way , poor audience of the class , insufficient quantity of learning materials , for instance , all of these matters should be enhanced until the good quality has been set up in the system .
Besides , by putting these kinds of procedures , students will also gain more respect towards their career and their job .
Hopefully , they will reach not only earn more money in their entire life , but also , society will have a more development shape in any other developed counties .
It is true that coeducation can motive the student while they work with other sex group students , we ought to also bear in mind , this is not the only solution to get the best result .
In a nutshell , based on the above - mentioned point such as , quality of the educations system not only interests with mix - education but also it will need some good solutions in some subjects that were mentioned .

The pie charts illustrate the amount of household earnings allocation within regular families in two different years ( 2000 and 2010 ) .
overall , in both years , the amount of earnings allocation was predominantly from Housing then followed by food / clothes .
Regarding the pie charts , there were significantly increased in the number of earnings allocation for Housing and Food / Clothes from about 35% and 25% in 2000 to about 50% and 35% in 2010 , respectively .
Furthermore , there was a slight decrease in Vacations / leisure allocation from 25% in 2000 to around 10% in 2010 .

Thus , people view that children learn foreign language at primary school are worse than children who learn one later .
Nonetheless , I would contend that learning foreign languages at primary school brings countless benefits to children .
Not only is there less study burden when compare by secondary school , but they are able communicating with foreigners as well as extend their societal network during that period and in the later life .
Rather than concern about the challenges , children would confront with them , it is particularly advantaged for them to grasp foreign language during the elementary school .
By way of conclusion , I once again reaffirm my position that the advantages of learning foreign language at primary school is much outweigh than the drawbacks .
Given that these children would have a better development in the future , as well as more free time .

Roughly speaking , there are three causes of pressure .
First of all , the biggest problem is studying .
It is not easy to adapt to a new learning environment , the language is the biggest difficulty .
Students have to do assignments with another language and use a different thinking manner .
The second problem could be from peers ' stresses .
Students want to make new local friends , but cultural customs and taboos could be a problem to be noticed and adapt to .
Lastly , the problem is from students themselves .
Students have to confront and get over every challenge .
As family and friends do not accompany them , students must do a lot , from basic living to future studies .
It is hard to live overseas alone , Therefore , making friends from the same country means that they can assist one another .

The evolution of my city is more or less similar to the evolution of my country .
When I was a child , my city was dirty because people were throwing their rubbish on the floor .

A story
One day , my old brother went to a park where we often go to play tennis , he saw a boy who held a red hat cried on the branch , not knowing what to do , he stranded behind a big tree and looked at the boy .
A few minutes ago , some boy who looks like elderly than my old brother closed to the poor little boy , the little boy stopped cried , he looked on some boy , my My brother felt afraid because they look like rube , but but he still wanted to help the little boy .
Suddenly , a rube boy grabbed the little boy 's clothes , the little boy was cried out loudly , my brother was outrege , ran to the rube boy and attached him .
The little boy more and more sadly , tears rolled down from his eyes , my brother pity him , he gave the little boy his smartphone and open a good music , the little boy stopped to cried and started to smiled .
In the evening , the little boy 's mother took him home , he told his mother that what happens today , his mother smiled to my brother , and took the little boy gone , my brother smiled and went home .

in a car accident , when she her what had happened with her brother , she was so nervous . Then the miracle happened . Lets talk about one of them , that is ' cleanliness ' . Nowadays , we all know that we are spreading the garbage near our houses and offices .
This may be due to people are not being aware about consequences of this bad habit- spreading the rubbish .
For example , they collect plastic waste in a yellow dustbin , while , liquid and solid , degradable waste goes in a red container .
This makes it easy and convenient to identify the waste types .

I am concerned about pollution .
This issue has became a big problem to solve .
In order to help reduce contamination I take acction from the three " R".reduce , reuse and recycle , as so I am more and more ecofriendly .
I reduce the use of innecesary power at home , in other words , I turn on a light that I need for the while i use it;I take less warm shower ; I hit only the neccesary rooms .
In order to reuse , I convert all thing reusable , for example , a plastic bottle as a plant pot ; a glass bottle as a food container;I bring my reusable shopping bag and refuse to use a shopping plastic if a salemen offer me one to bring .
Today , we have more item to recycle as long as we clean them properly and put them in a proper bin , which will be use it by specialized factory in another item .
As long as i try to keep doing thing on a ecofriendly way , i realize that i am give a little from my side and i feel I am careful of my environment .

The fare of public transport is less than own vehicle when you compared fare of bus to fulfill whole tank of oil .
Secondly , air pollution is a serious problem nowadays .
Because of everybody has to leave for another place through their own car and carbon dioxide is released from the car .
The public transport is a way to reduce the air pollution , because it can carry more than a dozen times the people in a time and reduce the number of people travelling in their own vehicle .
So , it can also help to reduce the traffic jam problem .
Lastly , public transport that are always blamed by the people that are slowly and more trouble than using their own vehicle .
Although the public transport is slow , but it also do not take a long time of people to reach their destination , because public transport nowadays are developed more fast and enough .
In conclusion , public transport is needed for everybody in a necessary time .
Nowadays , the space needed for countries enlarges , instead of which , the area for farmland , forests and wetland is getting smaller .
The food for them and their living space might not be enough .

The Wheel .
I choose the wheel because it is the most useful invention ever because , thanks to it , the human works make easier , by example a way to move heavy objects , compared to some of the fancy gadgets that we have today . The wheel was invented at a relatively late point of human history , he oldest known wheel found in an archaeological excavation is from Mesopotamia .
In China , the wheel was certainly present in 1200 BC , for earlier Chinese wheeled vehicles , 2000 BC .
The wheel was found in a settlement built on stilts over wetland , indicating that the settlement had some sort of link to dry land .
( Taken from http://www.ancient-origins.net/ancient-technology/revolutionary-invention-wheel-001713 )

The diagram gives information about various stages in the process of making bank notes .
Initially , bank note should be considered in terms of the design such as background colour , artwork , and security issues.then,the preparation of metal plates is the next stage.bank note should be skilled and machinists.thereafter,this stage is printing .worker should pay attention to colour on both sides , special ink , and images slightly raised .
subsequently , this step is the most important.bank note should be inspected.bank notes are separated into good and bad if get good quality sheets , the next stage is packaging and distribution.at this stage , sheets should be cut into separate bank notes , packed , and dispatched . if get bad sheets.the nest stage is disposal.band sheets and bank notes are securely destroyed .
First , the bank notes are designed by consider , thinking from background colour , artwork , and security issues .
Third , this is the most important step : that printed sheets are manually inspected , the and this sheets are classified into three areas .
The next is called partially damaged shees , and bank notes are separaed into good and bad , good sheets will be cutted into separate bank notes and packed , the bad one will be destroyed by fair .
This is a method of making bank notes , and the operater should pay attention to the printed sheets and how to inspect them .
These pictures obviously show us what detailed steps of the bank to produce paper money into the application .
On the top of the steps is the inspectation by hands , that is to say , they should be separated into well - qualified ones , which are to be cut into bank notes , and delivered to the banks , and the bad ones , which ca n't be utilited are fired definitely at the last stage .

The aim of this report is to inform the committee about the attractions of this town .
Town center

Pluses

Conclusions

The diagrams show how bank notes are made .
Firstly , they design the bank notes ' backgroud colour , it is artwork and security issues .
Second is the preparation of the metal plates .
It 's done by skilled machinists .
Then the sheets of bank notes are printd .Printing colour on both sides and use sprcial ink or images are slightly raised .
When printing is finished , they should inspection .
It is the most important step .
Printed sheets are manually inspected .
In that time they at fist cut the sheets into separate bank notes , second they packed the sheets and diapatched .
At the same timebad sheets and bank notes are securely destoryed .

FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY 'S
It all begins in 1981 when freddy fazbear 's pizza open , the establishment it 's a pizza restaurant but this pizza restaurant in had robots , in 1981 there were four animatronics and their names are Chica , Foxy , Bonnie and Freddy .
Foxy the pirate makes a show individually in her pirate cove , The children loves Foxy because he plays with the kids , making questions about the pirates and count a pirate story .
In 1983 , The pizza restaurant reopened with more security and robots with a more friendly appearance .
When I saw the advertisement about the job , in this moment I think that it is very easy , I called the number , they give me the information , and I accept .
The rules are simple : just see the laptop , watch the animatronics , wait to 6:00am and close the doors if you needed I say OK .
My first night was easy because I only see the screen and pass the camera to camera and nothing strange happened , I could only hear footsteps and noises .
The fourth and fifth night were the worst because the animatronics were very active , they closed it and opened the doors because they try to get into my room .
After tonight , remove me the place and never went back to Freddy 's Pizza .

" The reality of transportation is that it is future oriented .
If we 're planning for what we have , then we are behind the curve " , Anthony Fox .
Transportation has a major role in a society as life revolves around motion .
When we talk about convenience , comfort and safety , then private transport is more likely to consider .
Private transport travel is totally on your own , so there remains no tension of reaching a certain station on a specific time .
People often tend to go on their own , as private transport such as cars can be bought easily on loans provided by banks .
Looking on a wider span , cars are these days available according to the public demand .
For instance , fuel - efficient , luxurious and economical cars are easily available .
With the advancement of the automobile industry , public transport will not be considered as the first choice in the coming years .
The above discussion suggests that people find private transport a safer , more convenient and comfortable mode of travelling .

We were going to see what happened , and we had something to see .
but nobody was opening their doors .
On our luck I had a mobile phone , but Michael was saying that we need to escape because we did not know whether are those bullies near the corner .

A health is an important part in our life , so our priority in our city is an environment , and people consider keeping our environment clean and work together to preservation of the environment .
Therefore , the municipality of environment put in place regulations and instructions to take care of our village .
This way is to facilitates classification of garbage and transfer each sorts of rubbish to a specific place .
Secondly , recycling waste . after collecting it , they then transport it to factories to recycle it to useful materials , we can use it again in all aspects in our life .
Lastly , workshops about conservation of the environment to increase environmental awareness among people , to encourage them to take care of their city , and teach them how they can recycle some rubbish to make beneficial objects to exploit it at home .
In addition , many residents in our town have launched initiative which target to clean up our village , and plant many trees on the streets to keep the environment clean and protect our generation from pollution . moreover , to attract tourists to visit us .consequences consequence , jumping number of visitors to our town , and reducing pollution which causes several diseases .

I 'm from Brazil .
Huang Ji Huang is located in the popular district in North Jakarta which many people call it PIK .
This a is China - based chain that is recently opened .
The place is provided private room and a karaoke room in one place .
Besides that , the public room is also clean and comfortable , but I recommend you to choose the private room to support our farewell dinner .
You can order a packages menu that Huang Ji Huang offered or you can also choose the ingredients that you want for your stew pot , but you must choose 3 until 5 ingredients .
Mala Sauce is a spicy flavor and it is very authentic and you will rarely find this taste in another restaurant .
But if you do not like spicy , you can also try the Honey Sauce .
After all the food is very tempted to try and the size of a portion is big enough to share with 3 or 4 people .
The price is cheap if you compare it with the service and the taste from the food .
Having a farewell dinner here is worth the money .
Every month , Huang Ji Huang always make a special offer from their cutomer , and for this month Huang Ji Huang will give a 20% discount for customer who spend 500 IDR above , for a complete informatioj you can check it on the website or call the restaurant .

A VERY GOOD RESTAURANT WHOSE SPECIALITY IS " TAPAS "
Eating " tapas " is a very popular way of having a meal in Spain .
If you are not very hungry .
For more than thirty year in Nerja has been openend every day " Big Fish " , a traditional restaurant with a typical cook of the coast of Málaga .
With your drink , the first portion is on the house .
If you pay between one and three euros , you can choose little dishes of fresh fish and different types of salads .
The portion of prawns is very famous , as is the octopus salad , which is known by everyone .
The service is very organised and fast , although it might be in high season , you would not have to wait a long time .

It is easy to make a boiled egg .
Here you are the recipe : First , bring some materials like : a pan , water , one or more eggs , and , sure a stove .
Third , let them boil on the stove for ten minutes .
Fourth , take the eggs out and let them cool for about five minutes .
Finally , to make it delicious there are some tips : if you like , you can put a little salt and pepper on it .
That is how to boil an egg .

The flowchat provides an overview of the steps of making bank notes , it shows that how bank notes are manufacted from designing to a thing we can used .
This process involves five main stages .
First , it should take some considerations in design , including background colour , artwork , security issues .
Next , skilled machinists is prepared , in which there are metal plates .
Then the printer will print some sheets into bank notes(50 bank notes per sheet).Subsequently , the technical must be used specially for distinction , for example , the colour printed on both sides , Special ink is used and imges slightly raised .
After this , printed sheets will be inspected carefully .

Describe a supermarket near your home
There are not very big Supermarket near my home , but there is a nice one .
It is situated in the main bolivar cross my home .
There are some big shelves in the center of the market that are divided to some different parts for different kinds of goods , like Dried fruit , nuts , flour , condiment , beans , grains , rice , etc .
Also , a section for Detergents , tissue , perfumes , etc .
You can see some store fridge around the market for Drinks and Dairy products like milk , yogurt , cheese , butter and cream . Also , chest freezers for Ice creams .In a corner , they sell cosmetics and a salesperson helps customers to find their required .
There is a cashier next to the exit door and you can pay by credit card or cash .

Military service is the military training which needs people have to join the army or voluntary service for a period of time .
In Korean , people should completed military service for at least 2 years .
Similarly , people have to join it for 1 year in Taiwan .
With supporters maintaining that it is important for national security and make people maturity , whilst opponents claim that the military service have effects on people 's study and people should have freedom of choice .
If the war or other dangerous threat the safety of a country , they can not get help from other countries immediately .
Therefore , people accept that military service could be an easier way to protect their country .
Especially some small population of country have a policy that is people need to join military service due to develop into a powerful country .
Secondly , the important for people to become maturity when they completed military service , which probably is a particular experience for 18 years old .
In addition to have hard physical training and get different special skills , people also can improve their personal quality in military service .
Military service mainly to improve physical , however study might be completed better in school at the age because it has a professional teacher team and a good study atmosphere , people usually find it easier to concentrate on learning knowledge .
Additionally , critics argue that countries are able to allow people to have freedom of choice for military service .
Relatively some people are unwilling to join military service , while some people volunteered in a military service and possibly enjoy it .
Furthermore , it also can respect for right s of people , especially for women who do not can adapt to the hard training .
In conclusion , it can be concluded that military service is necessary for national security and good for people to improve themselves .
The best course of action would be for government to attempt to allow people to volunteered in conscription when they have completed their studies .

The report explains how my town 's people taking care of my surroundings and to preserve this planet in a betterway .
Firstly , hyrid cars are only allowed to be use during weekends as result of this , most people do not using there cars all the week .
This attitude has reduced the enromous amount of smoke pollution from the pipes .
Many factories are follwing the regulations and not draining the harmful wastage in the water .
Secondly , Closed trash bins are provided to the people in order to collect the waste and recycling .
People come forward and utilising this bin effectively instead of throwing rubbish away .
As a result of this , the town looks clean compare to previous decades .
In addtion to that , recyclable waste , sell and the money will be given to the respective person .
This gives motivation to the public and they can earn by using the right way to dispose of their waste .
Example , free fertilizers , water pump failitiesand and pesticides .

As the technologies world is moving fast , and the auto mobile industry is also coming up with new variant of cars & scooters that work in very economical way .
Buying cars and scooters are more convenient than in the last decade .
In a few decade people 's earnings and living style have also changed .
People now buying cars and scooters as per their convenience and pocket .
Earlier people used to use buses , taxes , autos for reaching offices , schools , colleges , shopping etc .
Which was a time - consuming and obliviously cheaper way of commuting from one place to other .
Since today worlds is a time - saving world , hence people do n't care about their pocket .
If it so their will come a time when single people will not be interested for public transport .
This has a tremendous impact on other aspect .
Fuel consumption has increased in a few years .
Net of cars and bikes is the reason for heavy traffic jam every side .
Ratio of road accidents has been increased in a few decades .
People do not even care about safety parameters while driving on the road .
I must say that Public transport is a life line in today 's worlds .
PUBLIC TRANSPORT
Nowadays , we usually travel very often to many different places , so for us , it is more comfortable to travel in our cars , but for the atmosphere and for our wallets , it is n't .
It will be a great advance for people and for the atmosphere , and as well for the countries because we will save a lot of money .
I recommend you to use public transport .

I feel about my family in a different way from my friends .

Some people think that this is possible , but I disagree because it confuses roles in the family .
The parents have to give education to the children over obviously , love .
In conclusion , I think that the two relationship are different .

Otherwise the public transport do n't pollute , but the car pollute so , for us , travelling by car is better than travellng by public transport , but for the atmosphere , it is better travelling by public transport than travelling by car .

firstly , that private transport provide a comfortable mean to travelling from one place to another without sharing with stranger people a way and , by using this kind of transport , is also comfortable in free with choosing time of a trip .
Secondly , it is a good way of travelling or moving from one place to another without wasting a time in waiting for a specific time to move or even waste a time in waiting for a public transportation vehicle to reach all the point it should get it , but in the other side when you have your own transport or a private transport , is get a right to choose the time of your trip or when you want to move or stay , and nowadays , we can not afford to waste our time in taking public transport .

The most beautiful museum in Mexico
Now , It is the holidays and we need or we want to meet the places around the country .
Well , I will explain in this article about one museum that is considerate : " The Best in Mexico " , but why ?
The answer is simply ; this museum has many types of momias .
In 1810 , there have been a war for indepedent of Mexico and many people were fight with other people ; for example : Miguel Hidalgo is considerate : " The father of indepedent " and he was to fight with the monarquia Spanish .
He gave the arms to all the whole city .
You should knew about the prize for coming to the museum is very cheap : ( $ 15.00 ) for an hour . If you want to stay more time , the prize increase in $ 10.00 .
The museum is the most interesting place in my country because it describe our history about our country .
If you want to take photos the way free you can done .
Finally , you can enjoy the museum with all the family and you can invite some people from other city or other country .

Since technology and the standard of living are improved , many people left the traditional habit in using public transportation and choosing car for several reasons .
As we know , public transportation has not a direct way to fulfill our all destinations then it force us to stop in many stations first , moreover we should take the other one to reach our destination , so it is already obvious why using a car is better .
Secondly , public transportation is usually very crowded and make us not feel safe , since there is an opportunity for us to be theft .
Then , by car , we can enjoy the scenery , share a laugh , change our destination by sudden and many more .
Since cars are affordable nowadays , a family can have more than one . That make the number of car growing rapidly , but they do not think further about the negative side effects that a car has .
Firstly , it leading us to global warming , since the concentration of pollution are higher in many countries , moreover actually it is not only leading to but also make global warming faster and also can threat our health .
Then roads are more crowded right now and there are so many traffics so people wasted longer time in the road , then it makes one of the positive points of using a car is gone and the importance of public transportation is needed .
While in the statement is written that public transportation will be left by many people , in my opinion , is the opposite is true - that public transportation is our future .
It can be proved by now that the willingness of people to use public transportation is higher , beside it is not as costly as using a car , and the quality of public transportation are improved , so citizen have no worry using it .

In my country , we follow cricket as a religion .
Cricket is played by 11 players , which includes a captain , a wicket keeper and the rest are batsman and bowler .
A player who can bat and bowl is called an all - rounder .
This game is played in three format i.e. Test Cricket ( 5 day game ) , One day Cricket , and Twenty - Twenty .
Test cricket is an old format and I love this format as it really tests the players ' skills and only the best player can get success in this format .
But as this takes 5 days , many people do n't have time to watch this game and its loosing its popularity in young generation .
One day cricket is played often .
Its popularity spreads all over the world too .

I am writing to tell you about the Spanish military academy .
This school is located in Marin , where is in north Spain near Pontevedra .
The school is the Spanish institution in charge of training the Spanish navy officer class .
Students have to study two parts , which are the engineering part and the military part .
In the engineering part , there are a lot of laboratories , which is help us to easy to understand about subject such as Physics , Chemistry or even Economics .
In the military part , there are many obstacles and weapons for the marine corp .
For example , the planetarium in a navigate room for learnt about the position of star , four small boats use for practiced the leadership and navigation in the Pontevedra river , or even the simulation for maked the situations which are seldom happen .
On the other hand , five years in school are not superficial because now there are not only the military subjects but also the engineering subjects .
But , I am really proud of my school .

In my opinion , the public transport has a future because this is cheaper than other modes of transport , also its pollution is lower .
The car is a transport more comfortable than the public transport , but it is not sustainable , its cost is higuer and if all people move by car , The cities will be very pollutes .
Also , in the big cities , the public transport is more punctual than the car because this transport usually has its own lane , while if you use the car , you takes more time because there are a lot of traffic in your lane .
Other transport that can be very used in the future is the bike , this transport is cheap and ecological , also , more and more the cities are building a lot of bike lane so it is a good alternative .
For travelling to other cities or town , in my opinion , the car will remain the transport most used , although the new modes of transports could change this situation .
For the finish , I think that the transport most use in the cities in the future will be the bus , metro and bike , and for travelling enter cities , the car will remain the most used .

The Great Wall is a great military construction in China , as known as a miracle in the history of ancient human construction .
The exiting Great Wall remains mainly built in the 15th century of Ming . The Great Wall with a total length of 8851.8 kilometres .
It is a symbol of China , along with Tiannanmen Square and the Terra Cotta Warriors and Horses .
It was listed as a world heritage sight in December , 1987 .
The area of the Great Wall has been inhabited with many ethnic group since ancient times .

Travelling or moving from one place to another by car is much more convenient for a man than public transport .
By car , you can go whenever you want on time , with no need to wait for hours at the stations for a bus or subway train .
It is faster and cleaner and much more comfortable .
You can have some other choices , that you can stop to buy something : water , juice or a snack if you get hungry during your way or thirsty .
You would n't suffer anymore from the trouble or annoying stuff on bus most of the time , like : no room for you to sit , bad smell people can make , or get bothering or bushing .

The graph below gives information about seasonal sales for ice - cream of different places : in an ice - cream van and an indoor swimming pool in Jan to Dec .
Overall , an average of 5000 dollars of year about ice cream van .
First , the graph showed an upward trend to ice cream van , and in 2014,it has the largest percentage of sales at nearly 5500 dollars in Jul - Sep .
No matter what year , its lowest level was always in Jan - Mar .
May be because in this paragraph of time the weather was cold , the number of purchaser greatly reduced .
We can be seen from the diagram , the highest peak in the graph has increased year by year , as the low as .
Second , for the indoor swimming pool , it generally appear wavy falling , from 2500 dollars in 2012 to 2000 dollars in 2014 . We can infer , it will not rise sharply , and it is impossible for it to fall sharply .

Last week was a hard week for my wife .
It is just the beginning of winter vacation courses , so she has been struggled with a lot of work and students .
I think , that may be the reason she had the Sleep Paralysis last night .
In Korea , we call it ' Ka - Wee - Nool - Rim ' , which means being pressed by a ' Ka - wee ' , or ghost .
Even she was not able to lift a single finger tip , as if she was turned into a stone statue .
She opened her eyes .
Then , she realized that four indistinct strangers were staring at her , as standing just beside the bed .
But she could n't .
She could n't open her mouth , say anything at all .
Even worse , two of them started whispering on her ears , die … die .. .
Well , actually it did n't happen .
She just dreamed a terrible nightmare because I was not sleeping .
She reproached me for not awaking her up despite the fact that she had been calling me so eagerly .
But it is not true .
She had n't called me at all .
It was just a dream , but very real like .
Most of those dreamers claim that it is like real .
They think they really opened their eyes and awaken since it is too vivid and detailed .
Often they explains and describe the scene in detail like a cup on the table , friends who are watching TV beside them , a room light and so on .
But nothing is real . They realize that no cup is on the table , no one is at room , and the light is off .
- experience it when they are so tired physically and so stressed .
- feel drowning down when they are about falling in sleep(so they know it will happen ) .
- feel a lot of press on their body and can not move in the dream .
- feel the dream is so vivid and real .
- repeatedly dream again if they rarely awake themselves .
Some experience this so easily and often .
The most scary case I heard is that the ghost pulled hair into under the bed as stabbing her chest with a sharp gimlet .
Luckily , I have never dreamed it .

Military service is when people who is forced by the government to be a part of the army to serve and protect the country .
There are many countries which should be complete the military service when people who reach 18 , such as Taiwan , South Korea and Singapore .
The duration of the military service should be from around 12 mouths to 20 mouths .
Also , there are different sections of training during the military service . People generally do a lot of training to their obedience or how to use the weapons .
Thus , there is a cause of agreement and another cause of disagreement , which is freedom of choice and mental maturity .
As this topic , the one of the reason of everyone should not have to complete the military service is because of the freedom of choice .
Some people may think it seem to be a human rights that we let the people to choose if they want to join the military .
So some counties would not force the people to join the military .
If people join the military service when they are just 18 , it may learn a lot of life skills as there are quite a high claim in the military and the chancellor who work in the military may request to the soldiers that everything frequently be regular .
For instance , they usually need them to fold up a quilt in a specified angle or there is a specific time that you must wake up and get sleep .
But after a period of time , people could develop their obedience , especially to the young people ; they will be likely to become a more independent person .
To conclude with both sides , there are reasons to effect by people should or should not have to complete military service .
However ; the effects may be different , which is base on how length of the duration .

The picture below illustrates how to make bank notes .
First is to design the note , including background color , artwork and security issues .
Then is printing with special ink .
When the one side is printed , raising the images slightly to make the opposite side to be colored .
It is of great importance to inspect the printed sheets .
If the sheet is good or partialy damaged , it can be packed and delivered by veichals after being cutted in to separate notes .
Otherwise , the sheets and notes would be abandoned and destroyed in the fire .

My district makes clean my village and it usually tries to make it attractive with new social initiatives for the community .

In the argument , the author asserted that the city should prohibit skateboarding in Central Plaza .
The author claimed that the business dropping causes by the increasing number of skateboarded users .
Based on the author 's two concern , the statement that drew a conclusion that to prohibit skateboarding in Central Plaza is not a thoughtful and wise decision .
However , there are many reasons that can cause the business dropping .
Probably , the stores are too old in Central Plaza , which could not attract customers to walk into them , and they will have to renovate .
Second , the author claimed that the sanitation problem caused by skateboarded users is not only happen by specific person , whenever more customers should bring more waste and wrongdoing .
Moreover , the problem would case by skateboarding immediately is the skateboarded users take over pedestrian walking space .
In contact author 's concerns , the increasing skateboarded users would bring more potential to improve the business in Central Plaza .
On the other hand , the author should provide profound discussion why people who come to Central Plaza do n't shop there .
To strengthen the author 's conclusion , the author should put the factors above in the argument .

The graph shows the seasonal sales of ice - cream in two places - one is from an ice - cream van while the other is in an indoor public swimming pool , from 2012 to 2014 .
However , compared to the line of indoor swimming pool , the difference of seasonal achievement of the ice - cream van is considerably large .
Overall , the achievement of the ice - cream van is better than the indoor swimming pool , from about 1100 to 5500 .
The best season to sale the ice cream from the van is autumn , while that is one of the worst season for the indoor swimming pool .

A variety of negative impacts appears under rapid urbanization .
Not only the growing proportion of impervious surfaces , but also the " false " green infrastructure contributes to it .
Mountains of studies have demonstrated that green infrastructure is an economical , beautiful and effective strategy to control storm water .
However , urban flood keeps raging , even when the amount of green infrastructure full fills the storm water control needs in some areas .

I live in Bhubaneswar with my family .
About fifty thousand people live in the city .
It is a clean and environmentally friendly city .
People who live here take care of the city 's environment , so the city became clean and green place .
The parks are full of greenery ; these parks are also used as playground for children .
Ten year before , the local governing body of the city decide to plant more tree and it asked advice from the citizens of the city about the proposal .
Everybody got interested in the project .
We planted trees near the side of highway , unused lands , and outside of the city .
The trees are also stop soil erosion in the rainy season .
In the Morning , a waste collection truck came and it take these waste away .
These waste materials are processed with environmentally friendly way .

The " Casa Alvaro restaurant " is a restaurant situated in Valença , a small city in the north of Portugal .
There we can eat a lot types of dishes , but the most popular dishes are " costela " and " bacalhau na brasa " .
The restaurant won a Michelin star in 2013 .
As your enter the place , you are welcomed by a magnificent setting , a lot of photographs of the restaurant 's story and you have a wonderful view of the kitchen where you can see the chefs working , so you can see the quality of the food .
The clients do n't have to wait a long time until the dish is done . While clients are waiting , they always give them bread and wine .
The price of the food is expensive , but nothing pays a good meal .
In the end of the meal , you have to sign a book to recall in the future .

Firstly , start to use renewable energy .
to illustrate this , when we use the renewable energy , we reduce emissions , so , our natural resources will be conserved for our future furthermore sons future .
for example , by using wind Energy or Solar Energy for electricity generation , we will be used less fuel , what is affected in emissions .
Secondly , we should improve our regulations that rules impose people lowering using things that make a lot of pollution illustrate , using big vehicles or about building big facilities such as big factories .
As a result , ways to cut down on pollution . for instance , when one person uses a car for 6 people and many people do the same , that make a lot of pollution . for that , we need to improve our regulations to make people use small cars for cutting down on pollution for a better future .
All in all , using renewable energy and improve our regulation is two ways to cutting down on pollution for a better future .

How can you celebrate new year in your country ?
My name is Afsaneh , I'm from IRAN , I came to London 4 months ago and I want to talk about the Iranian celebration of new year .
1- chaharshanbeh soori
2- Norouz
3- sizdehbedar
chahrshanbeh soori :
It meaning Tuesday night of week and take place on the last Tuesday night of the year .at this night , people make a bonfire and jump over the fires and say to the fire : I give you my sign of sickness(yellow color)and you give me your healthy sign ( red color)and eat some special foods .
Norouz :
It meaning new day of the new year and takes place on 21 March ( first day of spring ) this day is very important for us because we cleaning our house , buying new clothes just for new year .The major things in Norouz day is haft sin table and include the seven items which start with letters " s " .
When the new year start we hug and kiss together , wishing each other happy new year and presents will exchange .
In during the holiday , people going to see their family , friends and relatives in type of short time visit .
Sizdehbedar :
It means Thirteenth day of spring , on this day , people going picnic and spent the day out of their homes on the nature because they believe that the Thirteen number that brings bad luck for them .

Running
I am fond of running !
Many people think running is a wasting time or that it 's very difficult , but I do n't agree .
Firstly , you will be stronger , enduring .
I started with three kilometers for one jog .
My best result is 15 km , but I guess awhile .
Secondly , you will be healthier .
Even if I have a cold , I will get out and will run 4 - 5 km .
After that , on the next day , I feel myself better .
Four years ago , I had often cold and recovery long period .
Now I have more energy and better health to become happier .
Thirdly , you will be more confident .
I started running four years ago .
After rehabilitation , I continued to feel hurt in my foot and I still limped .
I decided to stop this and , one gorgeous morning , I starting running !
As a result , I know the men can be harder than can be seem .
After these moments , you starting doing things that many people think impossible or even unbelievable .
My recommendations for beginners .
1 ) Improve yourself in a gradual way .
2 ) Work systematically .
Two - three jogging in a week is the norm for beginners .
3 ) Grow up .
First week one km , the second , one km and 300 meters , etc .

My Favourite Sport - Football .
There is perhaps notthing more pleasant than when your favourite sport is as healthy as it is enjoyable .
Since I was five , I have enjoyed playing football with my friends in front of our block of flats .
It all started very naturally .
The ball was an object which provided us with lots of fun while we kicked to it and had friendly matches .
It still gives me great fun within the incredible company of my friends and it keeps me fit as well .
The best time for football is a sunny day after recent rain when the ground is nice and soft and the air is fresh .
Football is a great sport for everyone , Men , women , children , adults , even elderly people enjoy it .
As someone who has played this sport for ages , my advice to people starting this sport is : get the right equipment , find a friendly team , and enjoy the game .
Soon you will also enjoy your improved condition and better health .
I definitely recommend this sport to everyone who wants to keep fit , have fun amongst their friends , and live a happy life .

Tom and I have been training for a long time .
We knew we had a competition and that it was a really hard one .
The other team was profesional , they had won many competitions , they were really good , but Tom and I knew that we could won .
We made a schedule with all our training days and hours .
Another day was starting , another day of training , our last one .
We had to make the last effort to reach the point we wanted .
Winning , we knew it had a cost , but one that we could achieve .
On that last day of training , we started with a light run .
After the run , we continued with our daily routine .
After three hours of training , Tom and I were extremely exhausted .
Tom said he was really happy and proud of us .
It had been a very long and tiring day , but Tom felt he had achieved something really good .

Working holidays abroad
Introduction
In order to do so , I conducted interviews with 30 university students .
Pros
Every single one of them said that if you work abroad , you will improve your English a lot , since you will be listening and speaking it all day .
In addition , another advantage is that by working all summer you can earn some money for your personal expenses .
Cons
However , almost every student confessed to having felt homesick despite the fact that they made a large amount of friends there .
Another drawback is that , unless you are really motivated , it will be difficult for you to adapt to a new city .
Conclusion
Even if there are some disadvantages , most students agreed that this is an amazing experience not to be missed .
All in all , I suggest encouraging students to find a job abroad during the summer .

Why do I recommend it ?
When you have finished your studies and you have gotten a job where every day you do the same activities , the brain does n't work hard and you might have some problems like forget words , dates , information that you had learned a few years ago , because your memory wo n't work in the same way .

Many drivers regard travelling by car as a future means to travel which helps people save much time .
However , others believe that public transport is better , due to the fact that public transport is environmentally friendly .
It is a known fact that travelling by cars is less green than by travelling public transport .
To preserve our environment , taking public transport is a must and a global trend in the future .
All in all , public transport should be an indispensable part of our future plan , because we have to protect our beautiful environment . Travelling by cars , although much more convenient , is never a clever choice for the betterment of our future society with the severe environmental issues .
Public transport is still a vital part of society and should remain as it is .
If everyone start using a car for traveling ; the road wo n't be enough to everyone as there are seven billion people in the world ; and even for the environment it is better to use cars as less as possible .
On top of that , fuel consumption would be too high as we have limited availability of fuel resources .
The government and public body should start thinking about it , and to save the society public transport is the best .
Certain age people wo n't be able to drive a car , so that they definitely need the public transport .
I can understand the use of public transport is decreasing now a day , but there is still a future for it .
So , in summary , to save the environment , to make the road accessible to everyone , public transport should have been used and we all should try to educate people about the importance of public transport .

In fact , some people just understand an aspect of this method , that is to say , they have applied the wrong method .

Public Transport with no Future
Since most of these public transport amendments have been remedial rather than something planned when foreseeing future problems , they have only been of limited help and , therefore , they have only worked for some time .
Indeed , using public transport is not only unsafe and uncomfortable , but also unhealthy .
One ca n't imagine how many germs ( virus included ) lay on a hand bar waiting for a skin to rush in .
So , little by little , and as the economic conditions of people improves , public transport will eventually disappear .
Also , you are able to choose a place to go depend on how you feel .
Especially in New Zealand , there are some beautiful islands and you can get to them by ferry easily .

Let 's start trekking as soon as possible , otherwise you will miss the opportunity to see fabulous scenery .

Public transport is a more efficient way of using energy .

I can start with saying something about the advantages : we are not just classmates but we are friends .

We usually meet three times a year all together to eat a pizza in the city center .

Are they the best invention ? : Cars
Nowadays , almost everyone has a car !
But is this a good thing or a bad thing ?
Cars can be useful for several reasons .
Firstly , they allow us to travel fast by road , mostly to the exact place we want to go .
For instance , we can use the cars radio to listen to some relaxing music , or listen to the news while making our way to the place we want to go to .
As you may be concerned , cars are very useful but they also have some disadvantages .
Nowadays , people are depending on them too much .
In addition , cars have been increasing the world 's carbon emission and that causes the ' Ozone Layer ' to thin down .
To sum up , cars have advantages but , on the other hand , they can also create problems .
In my opinion , cars are one of the best and most useful inventions .
Unfortunately , we should be careful with the way we use them .

For short distance , it is a good way to do exercise and to avoid contaminating .
Of course , it is not a way for long distance , but step to step , the traffic problems will improve .

Dear editor
I 'm writing in response to the announcement in International Sports Monthly .
I would like to say that my favourite sport is birdwatching .
I know that this is something strange , but I really enjoy it .
To begin with , I am interested in birdwatching because from when I was young and I want to be a biologist when I grow up .
Furthermore , I enjoy being able to recognise the different species of birds .
If someone wants to start birdwatching , I think he should be interested in birdwatching first .
This means that if he does n't like it , he will definitely give up immediately .
So , if someone really want to birdwatch , he should first know what species of birds there are in the area that he lives .
Then he should buy a pair of binoculars or a telescope .
To sum up , I believe birdwatching is a really exciting sport but you must like it to start it .

If service meets only the expectation and does not provide anything more than it , that means customer satisfaction is there , but the customer would not feel great .
If service is not meeting the expectation of the customer or its quality is just below what is expected , it causes customer dissatisfaction .
This will result in consequences such as negative feedback .
In this context , it can be concluded that 78% of the respondents are satisfied with both the customer services of builders and the results of Vasthu .
The rest of the respondents have positive feedback .

Learning many ideas and knowing detailed facts both are considered crucial for students ' education .
In my view , l completely agree with the idea that it is important to students to learn idea and concept rather than learn facts .
I would like to explain my reasons .
However , ideas and concepts give people a competitive edge in dealing with other similar issues .
For example , once I do n't grasp an idea that my teacher have explained in class , but just remember the facts .
When I do my homework , I find the problem is different than in the case discussed in the class .
While , if I go back to my textbook and try to realize ideas and concepts .
I work out the problem easily .
From this experience , I learn that I do not just remember facts , but should try my best to understand ideas and concept .
Consequently , you can reach high academic levels .
However , learning ideas and concepts need more investigation and understanding from many of the academic textbooks . .
I took physics class .
It was massive materials on a specific issue , but I attempted my best to catch its notion and that made me recognize any unmentioned points .

I was sitting here alone , six floors up on my little balcony , when I heard shots and saw boys running .
And then , I saw something black not moving in the LANDSCAPE of the woods .
I knew a body was lying there and knew it was dead .
A 15-year - old boy , the papers said .
A Bunch of sirens , cops and spinning lights were down there .
I watched till they DRAG him away , and then everything got quiet again , as it there was nobody , so I 'm sure the cops will ENFORCE the guy who did this .
I did n't see them till next morning .
I 'm looking down at those woods .
A couple 's coming slow on Frankstown , walking with a girl by the hand , had to be the boy 's baby sister .
They pass through Mason 's bar and stop exactly next to the spot where the boy died .
Then they started to put and REWARD flowers were the boy died .
Could they hear my old mind working to guide them , lead them and TREND them and get up out of this damn wheelchair and take them by the hand .
But I was in POVERTY , so I could not go and take them .
That was an unfair death .

Cultural visits
Tarragona is an interesting and beautiful place for spending your time .
TArragona is near Barcelona .
Restaurants and clubs
You should go to the restaurants located in the harbour of Tarragona .
All of them are based on the typical Mediterranean cuisine .
Mirabel , Aquamar and Siroco are the trendy restaurants .
They are very comfortable and cosy and a good price .

It 's a village close to Tarragona .
AT night it has a special atmosphere .

Several reasons can support this idea , but I try to focus on the most important ones .

These two reasons may be enough for every child to consider his / her parents as valuable teachers .
I , myself , have faced with so many cases that helped me to understand the teaching ability of my parents .
Once , when I was 18 years old , I had to make an important decision about my university major .
So , I just made a quick decision based on some research on the internet and some personal favorites and priorities .
So , by considering different ideas and opinions , finally I chose computer engineering as my university major .
Now I am graduated in this major and I am really satisfied with that .
Parents ' closeness to their children can be another reason that makes them good teachers .
Regarding this information , they can teach their children and help them to make reasonable decisions .
I remember once in high school I had to make new friends and I was dubious about my situation and it was a great dilemma to choose the best ones .
So , I came to my parents and asked for their help , they presented the best recommendations for making the decision , then I could make the best friends that I can easily go along with .
So , parents can be the best teachers regarding their emotional closeness to their children .
All in all , parents are a great source of experience , which can help them to be good teachers .
Also , they have so many close relationships with their children , which makes them a trustworthy characters as teachers .
I hope a day that all the children will rely on their parents as their teachers .

The title of one of the best thriller movies I have ever seen is " Seven " .
" Seven " is a story about a psychopathic serial killer , who kills on behalf of morality and ethics .
In particular , the killer kills seven people , each one corresponding to those actions - that , according to the Christian religion , are the seven deadly sins .
All the murders show characteristics reflecting a specific deadly sin .
In the movies there , are some references to the Dante 's " Divina Commedia " , an Italian poem , as well as to the Bible .
The second do n't agree with them .
In my opinion , shopping is not always enjoyable .
It 's nice to go through the shops and take leave with hands full of bags .
Unfortunately , we realize at home , that our wallet is empty .
That makes us sad .
What is more , shopping may affect our mood or even our body in a bad way .
When it comes to bargain sale , on such period , people start to behave like animals and rarely think reasonable .
They walk very quickly , even run , to get the last thing which is left on the store .
They sometimes almost fight for it .
It 's really dangerous .
All in all , shopping in it 's intention is an enjoyable action which often makes us feel happy about it .
Nevertheless , some people treat shopping too seriously and , as a result , become addicted to it .

Bright future for public transport
It is efficient and private .
The car has brought the epic change to our lifestyle .
We depend on cars so much , as if they are our spare pair of foot .
As a result , the rapid increasing of cars on the road has brought negative consequences .
Such as global warming , soil and water pollution and acid rain .
Secondly , vehicles contain many different fluids , including motor oil , antifreeze , gasoline , air - conditioning refrigerants , and brake , transmission , hydraulic and windshield - wiper fluids .
In most cases , these fluids are toxic to humans and animals , and can pollute waterways if they leak from a vehicle or are disposed of incorrectly .
In 2010 , a recurring massive traffic jam that happened in China caught the worldwide media 's attention .
Many drivers were able to move their vehicles only 1 km per day , and some drivers reported being stuck in the traffic jam for five days .
It is considered to be one of the longest traffic jams by some media .
On the other hand , modern public transport has been improved progressively in the past decade .
the subway has become the most popular commute tool .
On a normal weekday , over 8 million people use the Shanghai Metro.[3 ]
The public transport in my city is very convenient .
Even though our subway system is still developing , the main line that pass through downtown , several universities and popular city spots is very popular and has been many tourist , students ' and professionals 's prior choice for commute .
If I have to get to somewhere on time in the rush hour , I will first consider the subway over drive a car .
Eco - friendly awareness has positively affected the young generations .
Taking the subway to work has become a trend and all the changes that are happening today will sure lead to a bright future to public transport .
[ 1 ] Wikipedia , Motor Vehicles Per Capita
[ 2 ] Wikipedia , New York City Subway
[ 3 ] Wikipedia , Shanghai Metro System

All over the world , the number of overweight people is growing .
What are the effects ?
Obesity is one of the most important challenges of the current society due to the fact that the number of people suffering from it has been growing alarmingly .
Firstly , food habits such as fast food and sedentary lifestyle are some of the main causes of the surge in weight among people .
For instance , there are many studies by various bodies in the US show that more and more teenagers are spending most of their time in front of the TV or computer playing video games , they hardly perform any sort of physical activity and also indulge in fast food .
This shows that fried or package food and a complete lack of exercise are the chief reasons for the increase in obesity among young people .
Secondly , bullying among teenagers and a rise in heart attacks are some of the main effects among people who are obese .
For example , it should be noted that , recent studies by WHO has revealed that obese people are prone to bullying and there is rise in the number of cases of heart attacks among young people with obesity .
This example shows that people with obesity not only suffer from bullying , but also from heart attacks .

Peter looked at his watch and knew he had to do something immediately .
When the first hour had passed , he decided he would go walking .
When he opened the door , a cold wind whipped him hard but he did n't care about it and kept going .
He began to feel wet and that was when he noticed that it was raining heavily .
He could n't believe it , but he could n't stop walking . He had to get to the church .
He was wet , cold , starving , and outside the weather had worsened , the road was flooded and the cars could n't pass .
But Peter did not regret having walked in the pouring rain , because he had been with his sister on her special day .
There are plenty of sports . some can be practiced indoors , some outdoors and others in water .
Swimming is one of the most complete sports , because you use every part of your body in order to sustain and advance in the water .
The ideal is to start practicing this sport as children , because the oldest you are the is more difficult it is to overcome fear , but it is never too late to learn to swim .
Among the advantages of swimming we can highlight the following :
1 .
to delay aging , it increases memory and the ability to move .
3 .
Improving the respiratory system .
4 . Eliminate back pain and aching bones .
If you want to know more and learn to practice this sport , we recommend attending a specialized school , there are many good and not so expensive ones , where you can count with the support of a qualified instructor who will give you the confidence to start .

134 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation .
Various points of view are given concerning concepts of sexual intercourse , sodomy , lesbianism .
On the basis of medical and legal provisions as well as jurisprudence , the author formulates definitions of the mentioned actions of a sexual character .

The housing situation for young people in my country
Introduction :
Who can afford a house ?
Nowadays , owning your own house has become an uphill struggle unless you were willing to pay through the nose for it .
Due to the enormous economic crisis that have shaken Europe and that have intoxicated the real - estate market , most of the prices are eye - watering expensive for college students that want to study abroad or simply emancipate .
Even if they manage to save the amount of money for a flat , it usually has not enough room to swing a cat .
In addition , the unwillingness of the banks to lend money to anyone without a stable job is something important to take into account .
If you can not afford it , then just rent it .
Then , sharing the costs could be the solution for lots of students beyond all the problems that could arise from the communal living .
At least you 'll always have your parents .
What about the future ?
As there are no many signs for this to become a real , young people must wait to start their own lives .

In my opinion , sport plays a great role in our life .

Stem cells are undifferentiated biological cells that can differentiate into specialized cells and divide to produce more stem cells .
Science nowadays has developed a lot , and gave the population a lot of possibilities , like storing the stem cells and using them to heal the future health problems anyone could have .
All in all , I suppose a lot of people disagree with this subject because it is not a good idea for them , but in my opinion , it is a really good idea to save other people 's lives by taking stem cells from an aborted foetus .

The most popular retail stores are located in our famous mall , called Leo Center .

We provide a big furniture store , an extraordinary market garden , a well - known home improvement store , and also a large bike retailer with professionally trained shop assistants .

Sexual Harassment
Have you ever been harassed by others ?
Their behavior may make you feel uncomfortable and disgusting .
If you have or you have witnessed this before .
You should know it is called sexual harassment .
Today , I will talk about the problem of sexual harassment .
First , I will show you what happens when sexual harassment occurs .
Second , I will tell you how to deal with sexual harassment .
Let 's start by watching a video .
( show video )
The perpetrators harm the victims by words or assault .
Next I will tell you how to deal with it .
Screaming , yelling … do some actions which will attract others ' attention .
You can also prepare some weapons such as pepper spray , a whistle or an electric baton , just in case .
Yet , you should tell someone you can trust .
And then they can help you to solve the problem .
In conclusion , sexual harassment may happen anywhere , anytime , by anyone .
Let 's say no to sexual harassment !

In recent years , whether using the internet is beneficial or not has never failed to attract people 's attention .
While many people believe that the internet brings a vast amount of problems , such as a reduction of interaction between people and some bad information resources ; in contrast , I have a strong position that the internet brings manyfold benefit than drawbacks .
People should first recognize that searching for information these days is much more convenient than in the past .
We must come to a library to pay a lot of time finding information we need on the shelves the earlier time .
Clearly , the assessment has become much more efficiently with computer and the internet .
Yet , perhaps the strongest argument in favor of using the internet , is that the vast amount of information contended in it .
All the information in the world can emerge immediately after a click .
Admittedly , some knowledge is not accurate and logical enough , but it still offers us many other useful sources .
Simultaneously , some sources contended pornography and violent information , which make many people afraid of using the internet to search for information .
Nevertheless , it remains a good way to reserve and supply information which hoped to have more flows in the future .
It is well - known with a great beautiful Buddhist temple in Japan , and it 's also famous among foreigner .
Kiyomizu temple was built in the middle of the Edo era .
It has five stairs and is one of the tallest historical building in Kyoto .
People can see a great Japanese view from there .
Artists think the top of the temple is good for making a beautiful , nervous mood of stories or paints .
Also , the temple became a Japanese proverb , which is " feel like falling from the top of Kiyomizu " .
It means " very scared and nervous " , because the temple is very tall and it makes people such a feeling .

There are a lot of disadvantages of being a star , of witch normal people do n't realised . For example , not having a private life .
Everybody makes mistakes , but their mistakes are wtitten about and known by the society , what is unfair and harmful .
It can lead to being touchy and gloomy .
That is why a lot of big name suffer from depression or even try to take their life .
They got so lot compared with unpopular people , that 's why I think it would be unfair , if they have also a private life .
Famous people have to consider how many humans suffer from famine or work very hard to earn their living .
They should remember they are lucky devils not , like they often think - victim .

Everyone , from time to time , need a moment of peace to relaxed and recover their strength .
However , nobody has everything they dreamed of ; it is normal , that always in our lives something would be annoy us .
People who have the facilities to buy or finance something and are looking for convenience , have a great desire to buy a car .
These things makes we think about if the public transport has a future , after all , to do all the things you need in your routine , like to go to work , to go shopping or just to go out with the family , it is more comfortable by car than by bus .
The government needs to invest in better conditions of the public transport , with more options to the transportation of citizens , in order to make it easier to go from a place to another , and hardest the decision to choose between a car or a bus .
Everything has two sides and the choice of transportation is not an exception .
People have been debated about whether the private car or public transport is the first choice in recent years .
While reasons can be given to justify the latter , I am in favour of the former .
Firstly , travelling by train , metro or bus can lead to the reduction of gasoline consumption .
Meanwhile , with the same amount of energy , a bus carried fifties of people , and even up to as high as hundreds of people with the massed transportation .
Secondly , it could not be denied that travelling by car is convenient , however people who agreed with the idea point out that high - quality and modern public transport such as the Shingasen in Japan or TGV in Europe are much more comfortable .
Trains or MRTs
There are some places in developing countries , for example , in remote or highland areas , where people have not seen a car for many years , they have no choice except old buses to travel .
In conclusion , public transportation is still be the first choice of people in the future .

He started his career when he was sixteen years old through kart competitions .

After won another title , he signed a contract with the Ferrari team .
At that point , his work become very hard and stressful because , at that time , Ferrari was n't a very good car . In fact , that car was only able to go fast in a straight circuits .
Three years later , after intense work , Michael restarted to put his feet on the podium again .
In 2000 , he won his third driver championship with Ferrari and also won it consecutively for three years .
Then Ferrari with Michael decided for a new collaboration , so the greatest become a test driver and tried to improve the car out of the racers .

retirement .
This , unfortunately , was only an excuse . He was only pretending to retired as he had already signed a contract to drive Mercedes .
These persons usually give arguments such as that the public transport is never in time , or that it is difficult to get to your destination using it and without having to take 3 different routes , or even that public transport is not as suitable for a made - up short - notice trip as can be a car in property .
In my opinion , these arguments depend on how efficiently designed is the public transport system , having in count number of routes , timetables , cost of the tickets and facilities for users who use it frequently .
It 's quite well known the benefits that a good public transport system gives to the community are quite well known : an important reduction of contaminant gases , a hight decrease of acoustic contamination as well as , as a consequence of having less cars circulating by our streets , an increase of pedestrian areas used by pedestrians for healthy activities such as walking , running or cycling .
All these benefits surely will contribute to a better future for all the habitants , so let 's give a chance to the public transport .

Colombian became the first diver to win a world cup in the High - Jumps .
Orlando Duque //Red Bull
Orlando Duque , the Colombian diver , who is the champion of high - jumps of the FINA World Cup 2014 , stated that since 2007 he is thinking about retirement even though he feels with the force and desire to go to the World cup of 2017 in Guadalajara , México .
" I am thinking about retirement since 2007 . I have been lucky because I was injured , and I got better " , said Duque during the press conference of the World Series that , this year , will end up in Mexico on 17th and 18th October , after the competition of Bilbao ( Spain ) .
Duque , who was born in Cali on September 11th of 1974 , took a break in his career because of an injury in his right leg in 2011 , and after that , he returned in 2013 with the purpose of win the World Cup of Barcelona and the World Cup of FINA .
" I was 40 years three weeks ago , I feel motivated to train , and while I have the motivation I can continue ; now I do n't have no an exact date ( … ) I just have set 2017 in Guadalajara " , said Duque , who was the first sportsman who won a world championship of falls from height .
" The event of the Natural Well of Ik Kil ( Yucatán ) of 2011 was the last one that I had before the accident ; now , I am getting over the accident and I feel like I am at the 70 per cent " , explained the Colombian sportsman who noted down February , 2015 as the date to return .
The Colombian high - jumper presented in Mexico the one that will be the last stage of this series which is promoted by an energy drink in the Natural Well Ik Kil , in the Mexican state of Yucatán .
The Natural Well Ik Kil , which is located three kilometers away from the archeological zone of Chichén Itza , will be the final one of the Jumps season , 2014 , and in that season Duque and the Mexican Jonathan Paredes will face each other in order to be between the top five spots of the season .
The Britain Gary Hunt has already secured the prize of this series and from the second to the sixth place will be disputed with the Russian Artem Silchenko , the American Steven LoBue , the Colombian Duque , the Britain Blake Aldridge and the Mexican Paredes .
" The plan is to win this competition because I always compete to win .
I am located in the fourth place , but we are so close to the second as to the fourth ( in points ) so , the idea is jump very well even though the Natural Well is a difficult because it is dark " , explained Duque about his plan for the event in the Ik kil on 17th and 18th October .
In the male test , the high - jumpers are thrown out into the water from a height of 27 meters in height , whereas in the female competition the launch pad is placed at 20 meters away .
My favorite sport is running .
One may ask why , among all those possible activities , this one was chosen .
Of course , I do not count running indoors , but only outdoors , while the breeze is blowing in one 's face during the exercise .
That is what I call a good activity .
On the other hand , if it is rainy , the cold water cools it down and make one feel less tired during one 's time running .
This is my favorite sport for it improves my health in some many ways and boost the resistance and quality of life .
There can be some pain and almost everybody becomes really exhausted at the beginning .
Despite being a common and easy to do activity , running needs some care to prevent injuries and other disturbances as well .
Notwithstanding , a formidable pair of running shoes makes a huge difference if one plans to keep practising the sport for a long period .
Go to a doctor , ask him to analyse the type of step to make up with an ideal footwear .
I must say that , as a runner , I do not regret it at any time .
Everybody can do it , it is practical and simple , and the goals can be set in accord with the person 's needs and restrictions .
Do not hesitate to go out and try it out !
It does not matter how hard the players tried to win , the only thing that matters is the result .
Only the results will be recognized at the end .
Poeple wo n't stare at a paint at a museum thinking how hard the artist tried to do a good job , they will judge it only .
The crowd in the stadium only wants their team to win .
After that , if they played a good game it will be a plus .
Everything after a successful result will be a plus .
So , if someone ever is woundering to whether start practising this sport , they should be aware that lots of people will be expecting them to win .
I would recommend them to always remember that , so if things do n't result as they expected , they wo n't feel disappointed .
It 's all part of the game .

Parkour is a discipline in which its main proporse is to train your body and mind to be able to pass through a point A to point B , in any kind of environment , the safest and faster way , without causing no harm to your body .
One of the faundations used to develop Parkour was the Natural Method , created by Georges Hébert .
David and a group of friends tried to adapt this techniques to the urban environment , and then the actual Parkour was born .
David adapted it to the urban environment and created new moves .
Parkour is n't just a physical discipline , there is also the philosofical part . Altruism , " be strong to be useful " ( it is actually a frase from the Natural Method ) , develop your body and mind so that , in a dangerous situation , you will be able to save yourself and other people , and so on .
Therefore , it is due to its philosofy and the joy that I fell before , during and after a train , this is why Parkour is my favorite exercise .
